definition: forest or meadow viper (Vipera russelii siamensis or similar)

sentences.english: This one showed us why it was called saw scaled viper.
sentences.chinese: 這一次我們算是見識到什麼叫做鋸狀鱗片蝰蛇。

sentences.english: Do you know the difference between a puff adder and a gaboon viper?
sentences.chinese: 你知道鼓腹毒蛇和加彭蝰蛇之間的區別嗎？

sentences.english: After a bandy bite on the foot early that morning, he is being taken straight to the Jaddaman.
sentences.chinese: 那天早上他被蝰蛇咬到腳後，就直接送到了安達曼。

sentences.english: The sound hedgehog's picked up is Saw-scale, also on the hunt!
sentences.chinese: 但刺蝟聽到的聲音是同樣在狩獵的蝰蛇。

sentences.english: Viper Sting will now restore 9 Focus every 3 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 蝰蛇釘刺現在會每秒3恢復9點集中值。

sentences.english: We like the design of Viper overall.
sentences.chinese: 我們非常喜歡新的蝰蛇設計。

sentences.english: In 1998, Team Viper returned to Le Mans to set new track records in practice.
sentences.chinese: 1998年，回到隊蝰蛇勒芒在實踐中建立新的紀錄。

sentences.english: I took a horned adder from beneath a stone and let it sting me.
sentences.chinese: 我從石頭下面捉出一條長角的毒蝰蛇來，讓它咬我。

sentences.english: By far the most common snake in Britain is the adder.
sentences.chinese: 在英國最常見的蛇是蝰蛇。

sentences.english: The adder is also the only British snake with a poisonous bite.
sentences.chinese: 蝰蛇在英國也是唯一一種有毒的蛇。

sentences.english: Saw-scale vipers are their most feared predators.
sentences.chinese: 蝰蛇是它們最怕的掠食者。

definition: Dodge, US automobile brand, division of Chrysler LLC
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
